game.name: Crunky's Fun Rager
game.desc: In Crunky's Fun Rager, you play as Crunky, a bouncy energetic bunny seeking revenge against the mischievous Crunko Pops. Your goal? Keep Crunky hopping, dodge obstacles, and defeat enemies. Jump on Crunko Pops to squash them or collect power-ups that grant Crunky unique abilities.
